Summary: MASSIVE UFO! Similar sighting on Nov. 17th. 2010
Object Shape: Boomerang, Circle, Disc, Flash, Square, Rectagular, Triangle
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lake Havasu City
There were no other sightings in Lake Havasu City on or around October 6th 2010
divs: sighting details i was outside my home on 10\6\10 and again on 11\17\10 and was video taping flashing light's. i filmed in front and behind the flashing object. what my naked eye could not see....my camera sure did and what it captured was nothing less than awesome! this object had a formation that started as a "v" shape and had so many other things "attached" to it, that is what makes this so incredible. on 11\17\10, i video taped numerous rotating lights in a mountain area, where there should have been nothing there at all. this is really interesting......on 11\19\10, i contacted seti and told them of tapes...i have and what i've seen in the sky. they asked me, " do you see anyone flying these things?" i thought to myself, "what the heck, yeah they opened their window and waved at me". needless to say, the conversation wasn't much longer after that comment. the next day, 11\20\10, 2 military helicopters began circling the city along with...jets. i've lived here since 1997 and have never seen a military helicopter, let alone 2 at the same time. i just thought it to be strange that after contacting seti, all of a sudden the military shows up.
